Identification_Area.title: Chandrayaan-1 Browse and Data Dissemination Portal

Service.name: Chandrayaan-1 Browse and Data Dissemination Portal
Service.abstract_desc: An online tool used for browsing or searching the Chandrayaan-1 Data Sets mainly TMC and HYSI and online ordering only for registered users.
Service.system_requirements_note: Online access via common web browsers (e.g., IE, firefox) and Java Web Start at client end.
Service.description: An online tool used for browsing and searching the Chandrayaan-1 Data Sets mainly TMC (Terrain Mapping Camera) and HYSI (HyperSpectral Imager) data sets with a facility to order the datasets online. The tool provides a view od sub-sampled low resolution image chips (JPEG) along with their metadata for the user. The privileged users can also order for the data through this application. This will pass on user request for data products to the dissemination server. The application intimate susers about availability of the final data product as a part of the HTML pages. The TMC and HYSI data can also be visualized by the user as a Globe view of all the data acquired during the mission life of Chandrayaan-1 along with higher level products. This application can be also invoked through the browse application using the java web-start at the client end. Mosaics and Digital Elevation Models are also available through this website for the TMC instrument.
